name: search-result-container
description: Search results is used on a search results and category page to show the list of products for a search term or category. It also includes refiners, pagination and sort options.

itemsPerPage.description: Number of items to be displayed per page

allowBackNavigation.description: If set to true, back link will be displayed on PDP breadcrumb

className.description: Provide a custom css class name defined in the theme pack to target the CSS for this module

expandRefinersCount.description: Number of Refiner Menu should be expanded on load

disableHierarchy.description: If set to true, the default category hierarchy will not be displayed

includeAttributes.friendlyName: Include product attributes in search results
includeAttributes.description: Search results API response includes product attributes when this setting is turned on. Attributes will not be displayed in the user interface but will be available in the response

noResultsForRefinersText.value: No products found for the selected criteria.
noResultsForRefinersText.comment: Message to display when no products are returned with applied refinement criteria

resultCategoryNotFoundText.value: No products found for the selected category
resultCategoryNotFoundText.comment: Result not found text for category page

resultSearchNotFoundText.value: No products found for the given search term
resultSearchNotFoundText.comment: Result not found text for search page

priceFree.comment: Text to show when product is free

originalPriceText.comment: String that corresponds to the original price screen reader text

currentPriceText.comment: String that corresponds to the current price screen reader text

ratingAriaLabel.comment: Text to inform the average rating where {0} and {1} are the ranges

searchTextPrefix.comment: Sets the prefix to the search text to display as the collection title if a search was performed

numberOfProducts.comment: String to define the number of products returned found for a search term

oneProduct.comment: String to define the only one product being returned for search

categoryLinkAriaLabel.comment: Aria-Label text for links to other categories within the hierarchy

sortByDropdownLabel.comment: Label used for the sort-by dropdown

sortByOptionNameAsc.comment: Text used for the sort-by dropdown option of name A-Z

sortByOptionNameDesc.comment: Text used for the sort-by dropdown option of name Z-A

sortByOptionPriceAsc.comment: Text used for the sort-by dropdown option of price low-high

sortByOptionPriceDesc.comment: Text used for the sort-by dropdown option of price high-low

sortByOptionRatingDesc.comment: Text used for the sort-by dropdown option of rating high-low

sortByOptionRelevanceDesc.comment: Text used for the sort-by dropdown option of relevance high-low

placeholderTextMax.comment: Placeholder text to display on the maximum input box for input range refiners

minLabel.comment: Label to display with the minimum input box for input range refiners

maxLabel.comment: Label to display with the maximum input box for input range refiners

rangeNameFormat.comment: Format of name to display on range refiner min-max groups

validationErrorNotNumber.comment: Error message to display when a value entered for range refiner min-max is non-numeric

validationErrorNotRange.comment: Error message to display when a value entered for range refiner min-max results in an invalid range
validationErrorNotRange.value: Invalid range: minimum should be less than maximum

clearAllText.comment: Text on the button that clears all selected choices, often Clear All or Reset Filters

choiceSummaryLabel.comment: Optional text to display next to the summary of choices when there is at least one choice selected

choiceFormat.comment: Format of choice to display, where {0} is the name of the refiner and {1} is the refiner value

choiceRangeValueFormat.comment: Format of choice value to display when it specifies a range, where {0} is the minimum value and {1} is the maximum value

choiceAriaLabel.value: button press enter and space key to remove filter
choiceAriaLabel.comment: Text to show for choice summary aria label

modalCloseButtonText.comment: Text display on the button used to close the sort and filter modal.

minValueSliderThumbAriaLabel.comment: Aria-label for the min value slider thumb in rangeRefineItem

maxValueSliderThumbAriaLabel.comment: Aria-label for the max value slider thumb in rangeRefineItem

featureSimilarLooksTitle.comment: Text display on the search feature module as title
